--- 
title: "Example report using INBOmd"
author: 
  - 
    name: "Thierry Onkelinx"
    email: "thierry.onkelinx@inbo.be"
site: bookdown::bookdown_site
link-citations: TRUE
bibliography: ../INBOmd.bib
github-repo: "inbo/inbomd-examples"
subtitle: "This is an optional subtitle"
reportnr: "Add the DOI or number of the report"
ordernr: "This is an optional order number"
output:
  bookdown::pdf_book:
    base_format: INBOmd::inbo_rapport
    style: Flanders
    tocdepth: 4
    keep_tex: TRUE
    clean: FALSE
  bookdown::gitbook:
    split_by: "chapter+number"
    template: !expr INBOmd::inbo_rapport_css("html")
  bookdown::epub_book:
    stylesheet: "css/inbo_rapport.css"
    template: !expr INBOmd::inbo_rapport_css("epub")
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, 
  eval = TRUE,
  cache = FALSE,
  dpi = 300,
  fig.width = 150 / 25.4,
  fig.height = 100 / 25.4,
  warning = TRUE,
  error = TRUE,
  message = TRUE
)
library(lipsum) # remotes::install_github("inbo/lipsum")
library(DT)
library(ggplot2)
library(INBOtheme) # remotes::install_github("inbo/INBOtheme")
theme_set(
  theme_vlaanderen2015(
    base_family = "Flanders Art Sans", # "Calibri",
    base_size = 12
  )
)
switchColour(vl.darkyellow)
if (!interactive() && opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "html") {
  opts_chunk$set(dev = "cairo_pdf")
  theme_set(
    theme_vlaanderen2015(
      base_family = "Flanders Art Sans", # "Calibri",
      base_size = 8
    )
  )
}
set.seed(201901017)
```
